title: Isolation, identification, and optimization of conditions for the degradation of four sulfonamide antibiotics and their metabolic pathways in Pseudomonas stutzeri strain DLY-21
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Yaxin Li, Ting Yang, Xiaojun Lin, Jianfeng Huang, Jingwen Zeng, Qianyi Cai, Yuanling Zhang, Jinnan Rong, Weida Yu, Jinrong Qiu, Yuwan Pang, Jianli Zhou
